title: Valance
medium: Technique: couching, long armed cross, cross, double running, stem, and satin stitches on a plain weave foundation
description: Multicolor embroidery showing St Catherine, St Barbara, the Cross, the face of Christ, the sacred monogram, the symbols of the Evangelists, & the figures of monks & nuns. With the exception of individual details the design is symmetrical on a vertical axis. Pattern is divided into 3 compartments by 4 vertical bands of embroidery; 2 of a scrolling vine, 2 of the faces of cherubs. The bottom & sides of the cloth are trimmed with a 5 strand braid of yellow silk to which tassels of colored silk are attached every 2 inches
name: Valance
